revision.text: {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | Scratch Cat Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Iki Town Outskirts]] || Informs the player about the [[File:Lycanroc (Dusk).png|15px]]Lycanroc (Dusk) Requirement |- | Professor Kukui || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Professor Kukui's Lab]] || Informs the player about the Ultra beasts, Meltan And Tells About the Ub and Meltan Update |- | Kahuna Hala || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Iki Town]] || Explains The Trials And Grand Trials |- | Café Owner || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Heahea City]] || Informs the player about The Trials of Akala island and The Kahuna. |- | Actor Meredith || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Paniola Town]] || Informs the player about Oricorio and the berry colors that attracted it in the farm. |- | Kahuna Olivia || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Konikoni City]] || Informs the player about The Alola Pokémon League |- | Aether Branch Chief Wicke || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Aether Paradise]] || Informs the player the Boosted Roamer Rate Route |- | Kahuna Nanu || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Malie City]] || Informs the player of The Requirements To Fight him |- | Worker || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Tapu Village]] || Informs the player about how to evolve [[File:Crabrawler.png|15px]]Crabrawler into [[File:Crabominable.png|15px]]Crabominable |- | Captain Mina|| [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Seafolk Village]] || Informs the player of the Requirements of [[Mina's Houseboat]] Dungeon and where the next Kahuna is |- |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
